About the CSRVL The Cornell Computer Science Robotics and Vision Laboratory is located at Cornell University in Ithaca, N.Y. We have three main areas of research: Computer vision ( Prof. Daniel Huttenlocher ) Multimedia applications of computer vision ( Prof. Ramin Zabih ) Robotics , including distributed manipulation and micro-electro mechanical systems (MEMS) ( Prof. Bruce Donald ) Here is a pictoral tour of the CSRVL. Automatic Detection and Classification of Scene Breaks in Digital Video . These include parallel implementations in Split-C for U-Net and symmetric multiprocessors .
